name: GiveGifts.com
tag_list: gifts, gifting, personal-shopper, registry, ecommerce, shopping
overview:
It’s about being reliable, wanting to do the generous, right thing, but recognizing that having a system which reminds you, helps you decide and has a memory will work and make your life easier and less complicated. You will always be considered thoughtful and relevant.

GiveGifts.com is an e-commerce website designed to make sending a gift using the Internet SIMPLE, SECURE, COST EFFECTIVE, TIME SAVING AND PERSONAL, all you need to know is the recipients EMAIL ADDRESS to send a gift.

GiveGifts.com is like buying someone a GIFT CARD, it allows the gift recipient to choose their gift but lacks all the DOWNSIDE of gift cards such as FEES, RULES AND EXPIRATIONS.

A gift sender can save time and money by using the sites Gift Genius, SET YOUR BUDGET and it recommends gift options based on OCCASION, GENDER, OR AGE. You can send a gift in about 5 MINUTES, LESS IF YOU ARE REGISTERED.

The recipient can choose the gift selected by the sender OR CHOOSE ANOTHER ITEM OF EXACT OR LESSER VALUE; PRICES ARE NEVER DISPLAYED TO THE RECIPIENT.

Our research has shown THAT 80% OF PEOPLE WOULD PREFER TO CHOOSE THEIR GIFT WHEN GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY.

The E-commerce competitive landscape is vast but we are FOCUSED SPECIFICALLY ON THE GIFTING EXPERIENCE.

Our goal is to target the existing GIFT CARD consumers by presenting ourselves as a viable and BETTER ALTERNATIVE.

Using GiveGifts.com is a more personal experience than buying a gift card because we personalize the communication between the sender and recipient.

The recipient may also choose to receive a Visa gift card instead of a physical gift, this option is controlled by the sender. After selecting a gift the recipient decides where the product is shipped. All the sender has to know is the recipients email address nothing more.

GiveGifts.com gets its products from a myriad of gift specialty wholesalers and affiliates who provide access to a unique selection of products at competitive prices; soon we will also provide the ability to gift to charities.

GiveGifts.com â€“ Always the Perfect Gift.

external_links.title: Why GiveGifts.com is better than a Gift Card
